text: The People's State of Bavaria (, Bavarian: Voiksstaat Bayern) was a small socialist state in Germany that existed from 1918 to 1919. Category:1918 establishments in Germany Category:20th-century disestablishments in Germany Category:1910s disestablishments in Europe Category:1919 disestablishments in Europe Category:Former states in Germany Category:Former socialist republics Category:States and territories established in the 20th century Category:States and territories disestablished in the 20th century Category:Bavaria
title: People's State of Bavaria
